Description:
smoke.Data Explorer View.JDBC

Step:
1.Create a new data source named dSource_Oracle
   oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver
   jdbc:oracle:thin:@spmdb:1521:test
   root/root
2.Create a new data set named dSet_Oracle
   select all columns from 'client' table
3.Create a new data source named dSource_Ifx
   com.informix.jdbc.IfxDriver
   jdbc:informix-sqli://spmdb:1526/spmdb:INFORMIXSERVER=ol_spmdb1
   informix/informix
4.Create a new data set named dSet_Ifx
   select all columns from 'client' table
5.Preview dSet_Oracle data set in data set editor
6.Preview dSet_Oracle data set in data set editor 

Expected Result:
do not delete the table after exeute step 5 then execute step 6 no error
